brand.name: Être Cécile
brand.ethicalInfo1: Made in Europe, Être Cécile offers comfortable and cool everyday classics.
brand.ethicalInfo2:
Être Cécile's environment rating is 'not good enough'. It uses some eco-friendly materials including recycled materials. There is no evidence it reduces its carbon and other greenhouse gas emissions. There is no evidence it has taken meaningful action to reduce or eliminate hazardous chemicals. There is no evidence it implements water reduction initiatives.

Its labour rating is 'not good enough'. There is no evidence it has a Code of Conduct. It traces some of its supply chain. There is no evidence it investigates and reports on safety incidents. There is no evidence it ensures payment of a living wage in its supply chain. There is no evidence it audits any of its supply chain.

Its animal rating is 'it's a start'. It does not use fur, leather, down, exotic animal skin or angora. It uses wool, silk and exotic animal hair.

Être Cécile is rated 'Not good enough' overall.
brand.positiveText: Dear Être Cécile, I love the style and features of your products, and also that you care about people, the planet and animals. Good On You!
brand.negativeText: Dear Être Cécile, I love the style and features of your products, but I'm concerned about the impact of your brand on workers, the environment and animals. Until you do better I'll be looking for alternative brands that meet my needs.
